title: Reading Files in Go
description: The Reading Files lab is designed to help you learn how to read files in Go. You will learn how to read files in different ways, including reading the entire file, reading specific parts of the file, and using the bufio package to read files.

meta.title: Reading Files in Go
meta.description: Learn how to read files in Go, including reading the entire file, reading specific parts, and using the bufio package.
meta.keywords: file reading, go, file operations, go labs, bufio, go playground online, programming, go lab, go practice
